review: Doctor was very friendly and cleared all my doubts with smile. Really felt he is a very good Doctor and a very good human being
I injured my knee and was thinking something severe, but the doctor cleared explained and gave medication accordingly. ** *********** ********** **** *********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Diagnosed the ankle twist swelling as ligament tear. No X-ray, nothing. He was in a hurry to leave. Just pressed the swelling and prescribed some medications. Later, it turned out to be a bone fracture. Had to bear 3 weeks of pain and suffering. Not recommended at all.

*** ****** ********* ** *********** *** **** **** ******* ******** ********* **** the medicines he gave were having lot of side effects like dizziness, loose motion. I visited another doctor after 2 days and got correct treatment at Manipal by doctor Hemant.
I was very dissatisfied and shocked after visiting Sanjay Prasad Hegde.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Lower Back Pain,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review: He has saved my life. I was wrongly treated for arthritis by a popular specialist in bangalore and I was almost bed ridden when my father took me to his doctor - Dr Sanjay Prasad Hegde. Dr Hegde had already treated my father's knee problem - avoided knee replacement surgery, and got him to be normal in 6 months. I was also treated with food, rest and supplements alone and a detailed dos and don'ts to get normal from the joints issue I had. He is very lively caring Doctor who simplifies the problem for a patient. He also accurately diagnoses what the problem is. If we simply adopt the suggestions he guides to get over with the problem, then we are sorted. I recommended Dr Hegde to many people and everyone had tremendous recovery. I also depend on Dr Hegde for other doctors reference because of the immense faith in his knowledge and kindness. We need more doctors like him in the world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: consulted dr. hedge for cervical neck disc bulge for a second opinion as I was not happy with my prev doc's treatment. he was very patient and understands the issue. very happy with the treatment. I could completely avoid physiotherapy and unnecessary medications. followed my routine exercises and it did wonders. :)

I know Dr. Sanjay Prasad Hedge since 2015 when I had undergone a hemiarthroplasty in Manipal Hospital.  The presence of doctor on time, the diagnoses and explanation of issues, *** ******** **********  After he left Manipal and came to Banaswadi Medical Center I visited him for the first time, and it was to my comfort that I did not have to wait to see him nor I had any issues with the clinic very silent environment and the calm and polite nature of the doctor boosts up my spirit.

** ** * ********* It’s been 6 months after my ACL and I am almost back to sports. Last week had an intense back pain, many said it’s slip disk, he nullified everything and treated me for back muscle sprain. I back to normal from yesterday.
Visited Sanjay multiple times. He listens to the issues carefully. Very experienced. Will recommend medication only when necessary.
Doctor identified ACL tear. Had to take MRI. Doctor explained the procedure well. I finally did the surgery at my hometown as my parents are there.
Doctor was very friendly and cleared all my doubts with smile. Really felt he is a very good Doctor and a very good human being
I injured my knee and was thinking something severe, but the doctor cleared explained and gave medication accordingly. ** *********** ********** **** *********

review: Hospital charged me Rs 400 though it stated 250 as consultation fee.Doctor was good and was in a hurry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was quite friendly and explained the reason for the situation. He diagnosed the problem *** ********* ********* ******** for pain relief.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My mother visited Dr Sanjay for her knee and shoulder pain, but in two minutes he gave his judgement that you have to go for surgery. He also ignored the shoulder pain and keep on stressing on surgery.
******* ** *** * ***** patient tend to get scared thinking of surgery, it's doctors responsibility to explain the whole process and give confidence that they have capability to improve the life of patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was extremely friendly and thorough knowledge of ailment being faced by my mother. However these good things of doctor were nullified by the hospital staff management who made us wait for more tan 1 hour. if you are planning to visit the doctor expect a time frame of 2 to 3 hours in hospital.
Good Doctor. Caring and listening. I brought my mother to him and he advised correctly. He is not someone who will go overboard.
I had ankle Surgery for kwire removal. He listens to my questions and answered properly. Good doctor.
Not very good doctor, He was in hurry didn't diagnosed problem correctly. Even after taking his treatment for month I am not recovered fully. I am still having severe pain in knee.
One of the finest human being I ever met, he is full of life and I definitely recommend him to my near and dear once.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Recommend more of exercises than medicines. Which helps to solve the problem permanently.  Where as others don't do this
